Package gw.api.webservice.maintenanceTools

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MaintenanceToolsBase
    The base interface to methods used for managing the application. This is distinct from ISystemToolsAPI which is concerned with managing the application platform. There is an application specific interface derived from this, such as ICCMaintenanceTools and IPCMaintenanceTools.
    MaintenanceToolsImpl
    The base class to methods used for managing the application. This is distinct from ISystemToolsAPI which is concerned with managing the application platform. There are application specific implementations of this class for each product.
    ProcessIDStatus
    Please use ProcessStatus instead.
    ProcessStatus
    Contains information about the status of a previously started batch process. This could contain status information for a process that is currently running or for a process that ran was run in the past. If the process is not currently running, the opsCompleted and failedOps fields won't have any useful information.
    UpdateTableStatisticsData
    Contains the set of SQL that can be applied to update database statistics for the given table.
    WQTaskDetails
    Details for a particular Worker Task.
    WQueueExecutorDetails
    Details for a particular WorkQueueExecutor of a particular WorkQueue for a particular host.
    WQueueStatus
    Detailed information about Worker Queue.
    WorkQueueConfig
    Carries information about the distributed worker processes for a distributed workqueue. Used to query and set the worker configuration on a server.
    WorkQueueStatus
    Detailed information about Worker Queue.
